original_text: So Jesse took some loaves of bread, a bag with wine in it, and a young goat. He put them on the back of a donkey and he sent them to Saul with his son David.
korean_text: 이새가 떡과 한 가죽부대의 포도주와 염소 새끼를 나귀에 실리고 그의 아들 다윗을 시켜 사울에게 보내니

sentences.original_text: So Jesse took some loaves of bread
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 이새는 빵 몇 덩이를 가져왔습니다

sentences.original_text: a bag with wine in it

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 어린 염소 한 마리를 가져왔습니다

sentences.original_text: He put them on the back of a donkey
and he sent them to Saul
